main event: A round, yellowish red light hovered then moved rapidly to the northeast in Millville, N.J. on November 26, 1954.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 23 minutes,The object was reported as a round shape with yellowish red lights,The officer noted that the sighting might be related to searchlights operating in the area,The observation was deemed possibly an optical illusion created by weather conditions,There was only one confirmed object observed.
witness description: The object appeared larger than a basketball held at arms length and had black with yellowish red lights at each end.
